items.name: Dahi Baigana
items.description: A traditional Odia (Orissa) dish made with fried eggplant pieces simmered in a spiced yogurt gravy, often garnished with coriander leaves
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Chingudi Malai
items.description: A delicious Odia (Oriya) seafood dish featuring prawns cooked in a creamy coconut milk sauce, flavored with aromatic spices, making it a rich and flavorful coastal delicacy.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Rajma ke Kebab
items.description: Savory vegetarian patties made from mashed kidney beans (rajma), mixed with spices, herbs, and breadcrumbs. (4 pieces)

items.name: Anda Ghotala
items.description: A popular Indian street food dish made from scrambled eggs and various spices. It includes onions, tomatoes & green chilies. The eggs are scrambled together with these ingredients, creating a flavorful and spicy egg dish. Served with pav.

items.name: Veg Chopper Rice
items.description: Indo-Chinese dish made by cooking chopped vegetables like carrots, beans and cabbage along with rice and a blend of spices. It is topped with a spicy flavourful mix veg Indo-chinese gravy.

items.name: Chicken Chopper Rice
items.description: Chicken chopper rice is a dish made by cooking egg and chopped vegetables like carrots, beans and cabbage along with rice and a blend of spices. It is a popular main course dish served with a spicy delicious chicken gravy on top of the rice.

items.name: Soya Cutlet
items.description: A vegetarian snack or appetizer made from soy granules with various spices, herbs, and binding agents like bread crumbs, and then they are shaped into patties and shallow fried. (4 peices)

items.name: Palak Rice
items.description: A nutritious and flavorful Indian dish made by cooking spinach (palak) and rice together with a blend of aromatic spices and herbs.

items.name: Veg Maratha
items.description: A recipe from the Dhabas of India. Mix veggie balls fried and then cooked in a spicy and flavourful gravy made of onion, tomoato and different spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Chicken Handi
items.description: A traditional dish from north India made with marinated pieces of chicken cooked in a thick tomato-based sauce with a variety of spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice or 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Sev Puri
items.description: Popular street food of Mumbai. Crispy fried flour discs topped with mashed potato, onions, spicy green chutney, tangy sweet tamarind chutney, sev, fresh coriander and pomogranate seeds. (6 puris)

items.name: Tamarind Rice
items.description: Rice mixed with tamarind juice, peanut and spices, topped with curry leaves. Served with papad.

items.name: Sindhi Lamb Curry
items.description: A traditional dish from the Sindhi cuisine, features tender pieces of lamb slow-cooked in a rich and aromatic gravy, showcasing the flavors of the region's culinary heritage.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice or 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Aloo Tuk
items.description: A crispy sindhi snack made of boiled potatoes, which are flattened and deep fried and topped with spices and fresh coriander.

items.name: Chaunsa
items.description: A dal preparation from Uttarakhand made with urad dal mixed with different spices and ghee. Served with rice

items.name: Panner Bhuna Masala
items.description: A popular North Indian dish made with paneer cooked in a flavorful and spicy tomato-based gravy.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Chicken Bhuna Masala
items.description: A north Indian dish made by cooking chicken in a thick, spicy onion tomato based gravy with spices and fresh garam masala.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Tandoori Chicken
items.description: A popular Indian dish known for its smoky, flavorful, and mildly spicy taste. It's made by marinating chicken pieces in a mixture of yogurt and tandoori spices. The marinated chicken is then grilled to perfection, resulting in tender, charred, and delicious chicken with a vibrant red or orange hue.

items.name: Pav Bhaji
items.description: Mix of different veggies boiled and cooked in a spicy flavourful gravy of onion, tomato and fresh pav bhaji masala topped with butter and fresh corriander served with 2 buns.

items.name: Masoor Aloo Ki Biryani
items.description: A delicious vegetarian dish where red lentils (masoor) and potatoes (aloo) layered with fragrant rice and spices, creating a flavorful one-pot meal with a rich, hearty taste.

items.name: Attirachi Biryani
items.description: A biryani from the syrian community from Kerala where the lamb pieces are cooked in flavourful korma with cashew and yogurt. A rich mixture of coconut milk and lamb stock is added to the biryani before it is put on dum. Served with raita + achar + papad.

items.name: Paneer 65
items.description: A popular Indian appetizer made with cubes of paneer (Indian cottage cheese) that have been marinated in a blend of spices and then deep-fried until crispy. The dish is spiced with a mix of chili powder, cumin, and coriander.

items.name: Godu Saru
items.description: A tangy and aromatic South Indian lentil-based soup, enriched with a unique spice blend, enjoyed with rice

items.name: Veg Singapore Rice
items.description: A delightful and spicy vegetarian stir-fried rice dish. It includes cooked rice, mixed vegetables, and a flavorful sauce that incorporates ingredients like soy sauce, chili sauce, and various spices to create a tasty and satisfying meal.

items.name: Chicken Singapore Rice
items.description: A delightful and spicy vegetarian stir-fried rice dish. It includes cooked rice, chicken,mixed vegetables, and a flavorful sauce that incorporates ingredients like soy sauce, chili sauce, and various spices to create a tasty and satisfying meal.

items.name: Gobi Manchurian
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese dish made with crispy fried cauliflower florrets tossed in a spicy, tangy sauce. It's a perfect vegetarian appetizer.

items.name: Karuveppilai Sadam
items.description: A South Indian rice dish flavored with a tempering of curry leaves (karuveppilai), mustard seeds, urad dal, chilies, and other spices. It's a fragrant and delicious rice preparation.
